      • evaluateModel

        public static Result evaluateModel​(MultiXClassifier h,
                                   weka.core.Instances D_train,
                                   weka.core.Instances D_test,
                                   String top)
                            throws Exception
        EvaluateModel - Build model 'h' on 'D_train', test it on 'D_test', threshold it according to 'top', using default verbosity option.
        Parameters:
        h - a multi-dim. classifier
        D_train - training data
        D_test - test data
        top - Threshold OPtion (pertains to multi-label data only)
        Returns:
        Result raw prediction data with evaluation statistics included.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • evaluateModel

        public static Result evaluateModel​(MultiXClassifier h,
                                   weka.core.Instances D_train,
                                   weka.core.Instances D_test,
                                   String top,
                                   String vop)
                            throws Exception
        EvaluateModel - Build model 'h' on 'D_train', test it on 'D_test', threshold it according to 'top', verbosity 'vop'.
        Parameters:
        h - a multi-dim. classifier
        D_train - training data
        D_test - test data
        top - Threshold OPtion (pertains to multi-label data only)
        vop - Verbosity OPtion (which measures do we want to calculate/output)
        Returns:
        Result raw prediction data with evaluation statistics included.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • evaluateModel

        public static Result evaluateModel​(MultiXClassifier h,
                                   weka.core.Instances D_test,
                                   String tal,
                                   String vop)
                            throws Exception
        EvaluateModel - Assume 'h' is already built, test it on 'D_test', threshold it according to 'top', verbosity 'vop'.
        Parameters:
        h - a multi-dim. classifier
        D_test - test data
        tal - Threshold VALUES (not option)
        vop - Verbosity OPtion (which measures do we want to calculate/output)
        Returns:
        Result raw prediction data with evaluation statistics included.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • cvModel

        public static Result cvModel​(MultiLabelClassifier h,
                             weka.core.Instances D,
                             int numFolds,
                             String top)
                      throws Exception
        CVModel - Split D into train/test folds, and then train and evaluate on each one.
        Parameters:
        h - a multi-output classifier
        D - test data Instances
        numFolds - number of folds of CV
        top - Threshold OPtion (pertains to multi-label data only)
        Returns:
        Result raw prediction data with evaluation statistics included.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • cvModel

        public static Result cvModel​(MultiLabelClassifier h,
                             weka.core.Instances D,
                             int numFolds,
                             String top,
                             String vop)
                      throws Exception
        CVModel - Split D into train/test folds, and then train and evaluate on each one.
        Parameters:
        h - a multi-output classifier
        D - test data Instances
        numFolds - number of folds of CV
        top - Threshold OPtion (pertains to multi-label data only)
        vop - Verbosity OPtion (which measures do we want to calculate/output)
        Returns:
        Result raw prediction data with evaluation statistics included.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • evaluateModel

        public static Result evaluateModel​(MultiXClassifier h,
                                   weka.core.Instances D_train,
                                   weka.core.Instances D_test)
                            throws Exception
        EvaluateModel - Build model 'h' on 'D_train', test it on 'D_test'. Note that raw multi-label predictions returned in Result may not have been thresholded yet. However, data statistics, classifier info, and running times are inpregnated into the Result here.
        Parameters:
        h - a multi-dim. classifier
        D_train - training data
        D_test - test data
        Returns:
        raw prediction data (no evaluation yet)
        Throws:
        Exception

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • loadDataset

        public static weka.core.Instances loadDataset​(String[] options,
                                              char T)
                                       throws Exception
        loadDataset - load a dataset, given command line options specifying an arff file.
        Parameters:
        options - command line options, specifying dataset filename
        T - set to 'T' if we want to load a test file (default 't': load train or train-test file)
        Returns:
        the dataset
        Throws:
        Exception
